summary: Magic Detox modifies healing spells to cure the caster of poisons and diseases.
descriptionHtml:
\"Magic Detox\" modifies healing spells to cure the caster of poisons and diseases that one can encounter, in addition to healing the caster\'s health -- and stamina if they possess the Respite perk.  Spells have been modified in the following manner:

Healing -> No Changes
Fast Healing -> Cures the caster of ongoing poison effects.
Close Wounds -> Cures the caster of any diseases.
Grand Healing -> Cures the caster of ongoing poison effects and cures the caster of any diseases.

I originally meant to make separate \"Cure Disease\" and \"Cure Poison\" spells, but that will have to wait until a later date.  For now, please enjoy this simple modification.  Should you have any questions, please feel free to send me a message or leave a comment.

*********CHANGE LOG*************
v. 1.0: Initial release.

v. 1.1: Fixed a bug with Fast Healing restoring the caster\'s stamina even if they didn\'t have the Respite perk.
author: SiliconMage
